creator: david.hay@ecosse.net
text:
If I pre-compile my jsp pages, it will no longer work specifying one of these 
jsp pages in the welcome file list in web.xml (if the uncompiled jsp resides in 
the directory, it is fine, however).

I believe this should work!

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Yes, it should - if you have a url mapping in your web.xml ( I assume you do ).
It seems like a bug in StaticInterceptor - you do have a workaround for that
( to include the JSP ). It should be fixed in a future version ( 3.3.1 maybe ).

creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
This is fixed in 3.3.2, using the 'strict23Welcome' attribute on the 
StaticInterceptor element.
